column4: I've got two JAV-applets which do EXACTLY THE SAME. One of them, however, if requesting a specific file from http://...:8000/ a file sees a different (faulty) content in the file which neither I nor the instance which works properly sees. How can this be! I'm using Firefox, 10.4LTS 64b and Sun JAVA.
are they *exactly* the same applet (read: file), or just supposedly functionally equivalent?
they are the same applet - run on a different url - thats all. However I'm the only pwerson having this problem.
Sorry, I got a phone call.
